title: New movie trailers news from Gulf News - International, Middle East, UAE, and Dubai New movie trailers news, information, data, and opinion.
text:
Synopsis: A Southern mobster attempts to rescue his kidnapped brother. 
Director: Steven C. Miller │ Cast: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack and Adrian Grenier Genre: Thriller │ Running time: 100 min │ Language: English │ Subtitle: Arabic │ Movie rating: 15+ Jackie 
Synopsis: Following the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, First Lady Jacqueline Kennedy fights through grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define her husband's historic legacy. 
Director: Pablo Larraín │ Cast: Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard, Greta Gerwig, Billy Crudup and John Hurt Genre: Drama │ Running time: 100 min │ Language: English │ Subtitle: Arabic │ Movie rating: 15+ Pet 
Synopsis: A psychological thriller about a man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But what will the victim have in store for her captor? 
Directors: Carles Torrens │ Cast: Dominic Monaghan, Ksenia Solo and Jennette McCurdy Genre: Thriller │ Running time: 95 min │ Language: English │ Subtitle: Arabic │ Movie rating: 18+ Bighamdet 3ein (Arabic) 
Synopsis: A hard working agronomist, Jad worked on a two-year Green project hoping to become the head of the project and overcome his financial problems and follow his career path. Nour, a relative of the company owner, came from Canada to Beirut to head the project where Jad became her assistant. Between his hatred towards her and her magical beauty Jad had a self struggle that devasted him. 
Director: Seif el Sheikh │ Cast: Zeyad Burji, Dj Hejazi and Dana Genre: Comedy │ Running time: 105 min │ Language: Arabic │ Movie rating: PG15 Jomonte (Malayalam) 
Synopsis: The movie is all about a careefree boy Jomon (Dulquer Salmaan), who is the son of a rich businessman from Thrissur named Vincent (Mukesh). The movie also depicts a father-son relationship in the most entertainment way. 
Director: Sathyan Anthikad │ Cast: Dulquer Salman, Mukesh and Anupama Parmeshwaran Genre: Comedy │ Running time: 170 min │ Language: Malayalam │ Subtitle: Arabic │ Movie rating: G ‘Jomonte Suviseshangal’ film review: Endearing family drama Bogan (Tamil) 
Synopsis: Who is Bogan? That is the question that drives this movie about things not being as they seem. This movie is directed by Romeo Juliet fame Lakshman. 
Director: Lakshman │ Cast: Jeyam Ravi, Arvind Swamy and Hansika Motwani Genre: Action │ Running time: 160 min │ Language: Tamil │ Subtitle: Arabic │ Movie rating: 15+ Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal (Tamil) 
Synopsis: Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal is a Tamil comedy movie written and directed by debutant Mahendran Rajamani. The film stars Jai, Pranitha and Karunakaran in the leading roles. 
Director: Sathyan Anthikad │ Cast: Jai, Parinitha and Karunakaran Genre: Comedy │ Running time: 145 min │ Language: Tamil │ Subtitle: Arabic │ Movie rating: G
